title: spack install paraview+python3 prints: Error: 'Call' object has no attribute 'id'
body:
spack spec works fine. @chuckatkins FYI 
~/projects/spack (develop $%=)]$ spack install paraview+python3
==> Warning: Missing a source id for opengl@4.5.0
==> Error: 'Call' object has no attribute 'id'
[~/projects/spack (develop $%=)]$ spack spec paraview+python3
Input spec
--------------------------------
paraview+python3

Concretized
--------------------------------
paraview@5.7.0%gcc@7.4.0 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~cuda cuda_arch=none ~examples~hdf5+mpi+opengl2~osmesa+plugins~python+python3~qt+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-broadwell
    ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@7.4.0+shared arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-broadwell
        ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-broadwell
            ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@7.4.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-broadwell
